subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Guus Hiddink's Dutch team won in European qualifying after he gave a win-or-I-leave ultimatum, while Fabio Capello has not been paid by the Russian soccer federation since June.
snippet: Guus Hiddink's Dutch team won in European qualifying after he gave a win-or-I-leave ultimatum, while Fabio Capello has not been paid by the Russian soccer federation since June.
